00014 //: Iterator for images and points stored in external arrays
00015 //  Steps through external points and images on demand.
00016 class msdi_array_of_marked_images : public msdi_marked_images {
00017 private:
00018   //: Current image pyramid
00019   vimt_image_pyramid image_pyr_;
00020 
00021   //: Current base image
00022   vimt_image_2d_of<vxl_byte> image_;
00023 
00024   //: When true, convert multiplane images to single plane
00025   bool grey_only_;
00026 
00027   //: True if image_ is current
00028   bool image_ok_;
00029 
00030   //: True if image_pyr_ is current
00031   bool image_pyr_ok_;
00032

00034   vcl_string image_dir_;

00037   const vcl_vector<vil_image_view<vxl_byte> > *images_;

00039   //: Pointer to external vector of points
00040   const vcl_vector<msm_points> *points_;
00041 
00042   //: Index of current image
00043   int index_;
00044

00046   void get_image();

00049   vimt_gaussian_pyramid_builder_2d<vxl_byte> pyr_builder_;

00052   msdi_array_of_marked_images& operator=(const msdi_array_of_marked_images&);
00053 public:

00055   msdi_array_of_marked_images();
00056

00058     //  Pointers retained to both - they must stay in scope.
00059   msdi_array_of_marked_images(
00060                  const vcl_vector<vil_image_view<vxl_byte> >& images,
00061                  const vcl_vector<msm_points>& points,
00062                  bool grey_only=true);

00067            const vcl_vector<msm_points>& points,
00068            bool grey_only=true);
00069

00072

00074   vimt_gaussian_pyramid_builder_2d<vxl_byte>& pyr_builder()
00075   { return pyr_builder_; }
00076 
00077   //: Move to start of data
00078   virtual void reset();
00079 
00080   //: Move to next item.  Return true until reach end of items
00081   virtual bool next();
00082 
00083   //: Return number of examples this will provide
00084   virtual unsigned size() const;
00085 
00086   //: Return current image
00087   virtual const vimt_image_2d& image();
00088

00090   virtual const vimt_image_pyramid& image_pyr();
00091 
00092   //: points for the current image

00094 
00095     //: Return current image file name
00096   virtual vcl_string image_name() const;
00097
